src:
Greste na bencinsko? Od jutri nove cene bencina
Bencin bo dražji za 0,5 centa, dizel pa cenejši za 0,1 centa. 
04 Nov 2019, 12:15 by T. K.
LJUBLJANA – Neosvinčeni 95-oktanski bencin se bo na bencinskih servisih zunaj omrežja avtocest in hitrih cest s torkom podražil za 0,5 centa na 1,276 evra za liter. Cena dizelskega goriva bo v prihodnjem 14-dnevnem obdobju nižja za 0,1 centa (1,254 evra), je razvidno iz objave na spletnih straneh gospodarskega ministrstva.Naftni trgovci cene 100-oktanskega bencina in kurilnega olja ter 95-oktanskega bencina in dizelskega goriva na bencinskih servisih ob avtocestah in hitrih cestah določajo sami. Drugod po državi so cene 95-oktanskega bencina in dizla regulirane. Določajo se v skladu z uredbo o oblikovanju cen nekaterih naftnih derivatov na vsakih 14 dni, po metodologiji, ki temelji na gibanju cen naftnih derivatov na svetovnem trgu in gibanju tečaja dolar : evro. Pri izračunu modelske cene se upošteva tudi biokomponenta.
text:
Going to the gas station? Starting tomorrow with new gasoline prices
Gasoline will be more expensive by 0.5 cents and diesel cheaper by 0.1 cents.
04 Nov 2019, 12:15 by T.K.
LJUBLJANA - Unleaded 95-octane gasoline will rise by 0.5 cents to 1.276 euros a liter at service stations outside the motorway and expressway network Tuesday. The price of diesel will be reduced by 0.1 cents ($ 1,254) in the next 14-day period, according to a post on the website of the Ministry of Economy. They determine the service stations for motorways and expressways on their own. Elsewhere in the country, 95-octane gasoline and diesel prices are regulated. They are determined in accordance with the regulation on the pricing of certain petroleum products every 14 days, according to a methodology based on movements in the prices of petroleum products in the world market and the movement of the dollar: euro. The biocomponent is also taken into account when calculating the model price.
